fields.label: Type
fields.description: Optional media to display above the question.

fields.label: Message displayed if answer is selected
fields.description: Message will appear below the answer.

fields.label: Message displayed if answer is not selected
fields.description: Message will appear below the answer.

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: Mode
fields.description: Choose the mode that answers should be presented in.

options.label: Present all options, let user state confidence

fields.label: Only one item visible at a time
fields.description: Enable to hide items that have been answered already.

fields.label: Show results
fields.description: Enable to show the results once the user has checked all options that were presented.

fields.label: Give one point for the whole task
fields.description: Enable to give a total of one point for multiple correct answers.

fields.label: Randomize answers
fields.description: Enable to randomize the order of the answers on display.

fields.label: Confidence levels
fields.description: Choose what confidence levels the user can choose from for each answer.

fields.label: Confidence
fields.description: @percent is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective value.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

fields.label: Your result
fields.description: @score will be replaced by the number of points. @total will be replaced by the maximum possible points.

fields.label: Choose confidence and mark answer
